subject: RE: JUnit text(Batch) TestRunner

Yes, I got the solution...
The CLASSPATH was set correct, just had to give the current directory path
too in it...

Regards
Vipul

-----Original Message-----
From: J. B. Rainsberger [mailto:jbrains@...]
Sent: Monday, April 07, 2003 10:43 PM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [junit] JUnit text(Batch) TestRunner


Are the CLASSPATHs the same?

So said Gupta, Vipul on 4/7/2003 --------------------
Hi friends,

I am in problem again.
I am able to run junit.swingui.TestRunner & junit.awtui.TestRunner, but if I
run junit.textui.TestRunner, I get error message of class not found. Will I
have to make any special settings for running the Text based testRunner?

Please advice.

Regards
Vipul
